SEARCH
Package entities

Class Repository

java.lang.Object
entities.Repository
public class Repository extends Object
Central data repository for the internship management system. Handles loading/saving all entity data from CSV files and provides access methods for CRUD operations. All data is stored in memory using HashMaps for quick lookup. Changes are persisted to CSV files immediately when update methods are called.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Repository()
    Creates a new repository instance and loads all data from CSV files.
